医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
躺着时的高血压会增加心脏病、中风和死亡的风险根据将于 2023 年 9 月举行的美国心脏协会 2023 年高血压科学会议上发表的新研究，平躺时患有高血压的人患心脏病、中风、心力衰竭或过早死亡的风险更高。 2023 年 7 日至 10 日，波士顿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/High-blood-Pressure-while-lying-down-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-attack-中风-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/High-blood-Pressure-while-lying-down-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-attack-中风-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db1d2b40-0b6e-4670-b3da-7bfdc0483dd3 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 23:06:00 -0400 High blood pressure while lying down linked to increased risk of heart attack, stroke, death
自测血压控制计划有助于改善高血压护理由社区卫生中心牵头的自我测量血压控制项目帮助高危人群，例如农村社区或受高血压影响尤其严重的种族和民族群体，从2020年到2022年，血压控制率提高了12.3% ，根据将于 2023 年 9 月 7 日至 10 日在波士顿举行的美国心脏协会 2023 年高血压科学会议上公布的早期示范项目研究结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Self-measured-blood-Pressure-control-programs-help-improve-hypertension-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Self-measured-blood-Pressure-control-programs-help-improve-hypertension-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7a40b70-545c-47ce-82a8-9cfb9e514e3f Thu, 07 Sep 2023 23:03:36 -0400 Self-measured blood pressure control programs help improve hypertension care
远程数字监测方案帮助患者更好地控制高血压根据将于 2023 年 9 月 7 日至 10 日举行的美国心脏协会 2023 年高血压科学会议上发表的新研究，超过一半的未受控制的高血压患者在参加远程数字监测计划后实现了受控血压测量。波士顿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Remote-digital-monitoring-program-helps-病人-to-better-control-high-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Remote-digital-monitoring-program-helps-病人-to-better-control-high-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f09f05b7-99b9-40fa-89bb-53ae87f6f200 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:47:22 -0400 Remote digital monitoring program helps patients to better control high blood pressure
研究表明大流行对患有癌症的老年人的心理健康产生重大影响根据《癌症管理与研究》发表的一项新研究，患有癌症的老年人在 COVID-19 大流行的最初几个月出现抑郁症状的风险很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-shows-substantial-impact-of-the-pandemic-on-mental-health-of-older-adults-with-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-shows-substantial-impact-of-the-pandemic-on-mental-health-of-older-adults-with-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f9ae63-20b5-4349-88ca-d9a0e273e145 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:37:23 -0400 Study shows substantial impact of the pandemic on mental health of older adults with cancer
空气中的微塑料是否会损害您的肺部？新研究探讨潜在风险研究人员在《总体环境科学》上发表的一项新研究中，回顾了空气中微塑料 (AMP) 的存在及其对人类呼吸系统健康的影响。该研究强调迫切需要更多有关 AMP 毒性的数据，AMP 普遍存在于室内环境中，可能会造成严重的健康风险，特别是对儿童和老年人等弱势群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Are-airborne-micro Plastics-damaging-your-lungs-New-study-probes-pottial-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Are-airborne-micro Plastics-damaging-your-lungs-New-study-probes-pottial-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2620469-bad1-4201-a765-70ff241b7372 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:36:00 -0400 Are airborne microplastics damaging your lungs? New study probes potential risks
新测试可以改善宫颈腺癌的检测美国国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 指定的蒙特菲奥里爱因斯坦癌症中心 (MECC) 的科学家们开发了一种检测方法，用于检测子宫颈抹片检查经常漏掉的一种宫颈癌，这些发现对宫颈癌筛查具有潜在的重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Novel-test-could-improve-detection-of-cervical-adenocarcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Novel-test-could-improve-detection-of-cervical-adenocarcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=754ebe70-fb38-4b0c-a6ec-39e25f9ff02b Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:31:32 -0400 Novel test could improve detection of cervical adenocarcinoma
重新思考更年期：专家呼吁个体化治疗和更多研究《细胞》杂志上的一篇全面综述深入研究了更年期的生物学、临床结果和治疗方案，包括激素变化对代谢和认知功能的影响。文章还讨论了从激素疗法到替代药物的各种治疗干预措施及其在控制更年期症状方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Rethinking-menopause-Experts-call-for-individualized-treatment-and-more-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Rethinking-menopause-Experts-call-for-individualized-treatment-and-more-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a5f767f-a424-4835-a397-43e49adbf628 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 21:01:00 -0400 Rethinking menopause: Experts call for individualized treatment and more research
报告称，临床医生渴望使用生成人工智能来支持临床决策今天，全球信息和数据分析领域的领导者 Elsevier Health 发布了《2023 年未来临床医生》报告，该报告是全球健康生态系统的最新动态，反映了医生和护士对医疗保健领域的变化和挑战的看法，包括快速发展的医疗保健领域的变化和挑战。生成型人工智能产品和平台的兴起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Clinicians-eager-to-use-generative-AI-to-support-clinical-decision-making-report-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Clinicians-eager-to-use-generative-AI-to-support-clinical-decision-making-report-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dc6baef-b3ad-4924-90d1-c79819a9e935 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:57:30 -0400 Clinicians eager to use generative AI to support clinical decision-making, report says
一半患有青光眼的 70 岁老人不知道自己的病情很难知道您患有青光眼。哥德堡大学进行的一项研究发现，近 5% 的 70 岁老人被发现患有青光眼，其中一半的诊断者并不知道自己患有这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Half-of-70-year-olds-with-glaucoma-are-unaware-of-their-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Half-of-70-year-olds-with-glaucoma-are-unaware-of-their-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4bbe04b-6ac2-448f-8f46-0d0d10fd8599 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:50:29 -0400 Half of 70-year-olds with glaucoma are unaware of their condition
新基金可以激励临床证据薄弱的高价药物的开发一项旨在帮助患者快速获得具有潜在价值的新药的新基金可能会激励制药行业开发高价药物，用于治疗临床益处证据薄弱的罕见疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-fund-could-incentivize-development-of-high-priced-drugs-with-weak-clinical-evidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-fund-could-incentivize-development-of-high-priced-drugs-with-weak-clinical-evidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09a2a243-7777-4582-a23a-10c7f3b6b4fe Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:43:31 -0400 New fund could incentivize development of high-priced drugs with weak clinical evidence
